name: PlayStation Vita Pets
summary:
PlayStation®Vita Pets is the next generation of virtual pets, a whole new pet experience exclusive for PlayStation. The main characters of the game are four talking dogs: a Labrador, a Collie, a Husky and a Dalmatian. Each one of them has its own personality, traits and voices. PlayStation®Vita Pets allows the player to care for and train the pet, go on adventures to solve puzzles, explore and find new objects and aim to discover the legend of Castlewood Island.

Uses all of the innovative and creative PS Vita controls for an immersive hands-in experience.
4 different dogs with real different characters which will talk only to you via facial recognition.
In addition to all the expected features, mini games and day-to-day tasks activities of a pet simulator, it also has a unique adventure to discover the secrets of Castlewood Island.
Take your dog into the real world with advanced Markerless Augmented Reality Technology.
